pages.text: During the development of the Mod and after its release I have done a few spotlight/update videos, you can find all of them in this $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-C5T60iSjyM&list=PLJB-Y_FDFQZ5EKkzc6IrDRv9sr1thJ27M)Playlist$()$(br2)Besides the videos I have released there is a few others that should be mentioned. $(item)Vallen$() from $(item)Mischief of Mice$() has made a $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hRe-nPCciXA)Bit-by-Bit$() about the mod which is fantastic.
$(item)SystemCollapse$() also covered a lot of the progression of the mod in one of his SkyFactory 4 episodes and you can find that $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=urmzj-jwUTg)here$().
